mapper.select: SELECT w.id, w.work_order_id, w.employee_id, e.name AS employee_name, s1.name AS dept_name, s2.name AS pos_name FROM WORKER w JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON w.employee_id = e.id JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s1 ON e.dept_code = s1.detail_code JOIN DETAIL_SYS_CODE s2 ON e.position_code = s2.detail_code WHERE w.work_order_id = #{orderId} ORDER BY w.id DESC
